idea-plugin.name: TagHopper
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin is designed for scenarios involving document-code linking and navigation, applicable for associating flowcharts with code, linking documentation with code, and enabling click-to-jump functionality.
Annotation Examples:
Jump to a puml file: @puml edrive-prod-corp\doc\核心流程\跳转.puml
Jump to a document file (file extensions are ignored): @doc edrive-prod-corp\doc\详细设计.doc
Jump to a markdown file: @md edrive-prod-corp\doc\readme.md
Jump to a folder: @folder edrive-prod-corp\doc
Jump to a Java file: @java edrive-prod-corp\src\main\java\com\cn21\edrive\Jump.java
Jump to a specific line in a Java file: @java edrive-prod-corp\src\main\java\com\cn21\edrive\Jump.java:100
Jump to a Java method reference: @java com.cn21.edrive.Jump#jumpMethod(java.lang.Long)
Jump to a Java method in a specific project (project name uses backward matching): @java {corp-portal}com.cn21.edrive.Jump#jumpMethod(java.lang.Long)
Notes:
1、For @java tags without a project name, navigation defaults to the first scan result
2、To reference Java methods, use the right-click menu option Copy/Paste Special → Copy Reference (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+C) to copy the method reference. Paste (Ctrl+V) the reference path into Javadoc comments
3、In cases where classes with the same name but different parameters coexist across modules, missing parameters in the copied reference may cause navigation failures. Verify parameter counts if navigation fails.
4、Navigation works as long as the referenced file and the file using the tag are imported under the same root directory
5、In examples, the relative path = absolute path excluding the root directory. Project names correspond to first-level subdirectories under the root directory
Comment syntax for file types:
puml: '
java: //
groovy: //
md：<ul/><!-- --> 或 <!-- --><!-- -->(avoids icon misalignment issues)
